website_summaries.verdict: An adjustable reflex ball that includes some extras.
pros: Features an adjustable headband and elastic string that can be cut to the size you want (the shorter the string, the more challenging it is)
Comes with an extra elastic cord
cons: The headband stretches but is not adjustable if it is too big for you

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Helps a lot I added it to my exercise regimen daily 10mins a day will get your accuracy and speed where you want it as long as you train. Not cheaply made either
customer_reviews.author: Devon H.

customer_reviews.title: too hard
customer_reviews.text: It's hard than I think. I can barely hit the ball. And the ball is too heavier than I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Ye TIan

customer_reviews.title: Really Fun!!
customer_reviews.text: I received this product on time and undamaged. I actually really like it. It's so much fun even when I get hit in the face with the ball:P I think my coordination and reflex will definitely improve the more I use it. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Headband is NOT adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Useless, the head band is too large and NOT adjustable. It moves all over the head, so I stopped using it.
customer_reviews.author: Rasit D.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Im a boxer and starting using this a couple days ago. Its great for improving hand speed! Even if you werent a boxer I would recommend as it is a really good workout!!
customer_reviews.author: Devin H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality! I Can See Definitely See a Huge Improvement In Hand Eye Coordination
customer_reviews.text: I train with this boxing reflex ball all of the time. It develops hand eye coordination and is really fun to see how long you can go without messing up. Very good quality also. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: B. Dot

customer_reviews.title: It helps him stay active when cooped up inside and has revived his love of boxing
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 12 year old son to give him something to do during the very long winter months. He absolutely loves it! It helps him stay active when cooped up inside and has revived his love of boxing.
customer_reviews.author: janorton

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: All the boys like it. Good quality and does not take up too much space in the house. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Jones

customer_reviews.title: once you get a good pace going and you hit the plastic ring a ...
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this 5 stars if it wasn't for the little plastic ring around the top of the ball. once you get a good pace going and you hit the plastic ring a few times it doesn't feel very good on your knuckles.
customer_reviews.author: Molten Mushroom

customer_reviews.title: Helps you focus
customer_reviews.text: Alot of fun, make sure the length is right, after that have fun with it. If you have pets, watch out, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Daiz

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: I've been boxing my entire life, so I have used many of these reflex balls, and I like this one the most. It's really good quality and the ball bounces back like its supposed to. The headband also fits perfectly and is really comfortable. I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tristan Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Great product so far!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product so far!! My son is just trying to get used to it..
customer_reviews.author: Vance Lovell

customer_reviews.title: good product I like it lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: good product I like it lots of fun. I have a small head and the band tends to slide down a bit but maybe for a bigger head will be fine
customer_reviews.author: floomz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My kids 8 to 16 are having a blast with this
customer_reviews.author: kate abercrombie

customer_reviews.title: headband and elastic string
customer_reviews.text: The head band is not tight enough and slips too low around the head. The elastic string is very thick and when the ball rebounds back towards the face sometimes it whips my face causing some pain.
customer_reviews.author: aem

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I was fooled by the video hype, so it was my own fault. I'm not happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Cortez

customer_reviews.title: This is the best boxing jab/reflex ball on the market
customer_reviews.text: This is the best boxing jab/reflex ball on the market. None others can compare... It doesn't break and it doesn't make you look funny like most of the other ones.
customer_reviews.author: joseph quattrucci

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I've taken boxing classes for a while and I've seen these used at gyms, but wanted to get one for my home and it has been great. My kids also use it for fun.
customer_reviews.author: Yugal Subedi

customer_reviews.title: Great training tool!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for me as I box at least three times a week. it has immediately improved my reflexes and accuracy. My son is 9 and he loves it too, treating it more like a game. It has held up really well and feels like good quality materials. The headband is soft but fits snug, and it comes with an extra length of cord.
customer_reviews.author: James A.

customer_reviews.title: It is high quality and the box that it comes with is nice. I'd recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I Bought this gift for my nephew who is into boxing and he was thrilled to get it. It is high quality and the box that it comes with is nice. I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: I really like this boxing ball. It's a great arm workout and is actually really fun and addicting!
customer_reviews.author: stacy bates

customer_reviews.title: ... wish the head band was adjustable but I really like the fight ball
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I can say is that I wish the head band was adjustable but I really like the fight ball.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond L. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought this!
customer_reviews.text: My kids absolutely love this thing! It keeps them busy for a long time and they always fight over who can do it better. I'm going to buy another one. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a cool concept but I feel like it needs some adjustments
customer_reviews.text: This is a cool concept but I feel like it needs some adjustments. My biggest problem with it is that the ball attatches to a bungee string and then you tie it to the headband so you can adjust it to your preferred length. Problem with this is the bungee is hard to tie tight so it’s constantly coming untied. It just seems a little home made to me and not worth the money. I wouldn’t recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Lee Richter

customer_reviews.title: The kids love it
customer_reviews.text: This reflex ball is perfect for my kids. They always fight over who can use it, and they challenge each other to see who can do it the longest without messing up. We LOVE this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. Brown

customer_reviews.title: This reflex ball with headband is really high quality compared ...
customer_reviews.text: This reflex ball with headband is really high quality compared to other ones I've used throughout the years. A lot of other ones don't work well but this one certainly does.
customer_reviews.author: Stephon D.

customer_reviews.title: I'm a boxing trainer and this is great for my students
customer_reviews.text: I'm a boxing trainer and this is great for my students. It helps them with their reflexes and hand speed. I've used these for years and is this is my favorite one thus far. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Jarrett

customer_reviews.title: Good for Reflexes or Play time
customer_reviews.text: These are good for reflexes and good for a made up game if you have some boys that like to get creative. I like how the headband stretches. In my house hold we have fat heads and fatter heads. LOL
customer_reviews.author: RKM

product_meta.title: Boxing Reflex Fight Ball by Abra Athletics: 2019 Model, Great for Improving Reactions, Punching, Hand Speed and Agility, Headband Fits All, Perfect for Boxing, Training and Fitness, Boxing Equipment
product_meta.description:
Boxing Reflex Fight Ball by Abra Athletics

Are you looking for a fun way to get in shape while learning a new skill? Are you an experienced boxer looking to gain the edge on your opponents. Or are your kids looking for a fun activity that will keep them busy and happy for hours? Look no further than the Boxing Reflex Fight Ball by Abra Athletics!

The Boxing Reflex Fight Ball has an adjustable headband that will fit any size head. It also has an elastic string that can be cut to the length that you would like. More experienced boxers are more suited to a shorter string as the rubber punching ball will come back to you quicker. Beginners can start at a full length string and shorten it as their skills improve.

This product has been used by professional boxers to help with hand eye coordination, hand speed, and reflexes, but also people that are looking for a fun way to burn calories, build muscle, increase indurance, and get in to shape. You can use the Boxing Reflex Fight Ball anywhere you go, which really helps people struggling to find time to go to the gym. Children also find this product to be extremely fun and addicting, keeping them busy for hours on end.

Why Choose our Boxing Reflex Fight Ball?

- Made of durable and high quality materials
- Headband is adjustable to fit every size head
- Safe for children to use
- Adjustable string length to cater to professionals and beginners

Feel confident purchasing the Boxing Reflex Fight Ball by Abra Athletics with our 100% money back guarentee!

*Supply is limited. Order today to ensure availability.

Order your Boxing Reflex Fight Ball Now and Boost Your Workout, Fitness, and Overall Health Today!
feature_bullets: PERFECT WAY TO IMPROVE YOUR BOXING SKILLS! – This amazing piece of equipment is sure to improve your hand eye coordination, hand speed, punching form, reflexes and more all while giving you an incredible workout!

GET IN SHAPE WHILE BUILDING A NEW SKILL! – Burn calories and get the body that you have always wanted by using the Boxing Reflex Fight Ball by Abra Athletics. Build muscle tone and increase your cardiovascular state all while improving on your fighting skills!

WORKOUT FROM ANYWHERE! – No time for the gym? No problem! The Boxing Reflex Fight Ball can be used anywhere. Take it with you to work, outside, or use in the privacy of your own home. No more excuses not to workout!

SUITABLE FOR EVERYONE! – Whether you are a professional boxer or a beginner, a man, women, or child, someone interested in boxing or just wanting a great workout, the Boxing Reflex Fight Ball is perfect for everyone. It is great for serious training or just a fun game for children!
100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE – Abra Athletics is committed to offering premium quality products and promises a full refund to any dissatisfied customers.
